Use Our Intuitive Chrome Extension to find expired domains ðŸŒŸ

Instantly import domains directly from your browsing experience with our Chrome extension. Not only does it allow you to check domain availability and SEO metrics, but it's also an invaluable tool for uncovering potentially expired domains with valuable metrics. Find hidden opportunities in expired domains that could be the perfect addition to your portfolio.

âž¤ Unlimited, Free Operations

Enjoy unrestricted access to all the extension's features. Scan, copy, and import domains to DomainBear with no limits and absolutely free. Our tools are designed for effective domain management and for discovering high-potential, expired domains without the worry of caps or costs.

âž¤ Advanced Domain Scanning

Our Chrome extension revolutionizes domain discovery by performing an in-depth scan of the active tab. It meticulously identifies domains in any part of the webpage, including those potentially expired but with strong metrics. Whether they're nestled in a sentence, hidden in a table cell, or in more complex scenarios, our deep scanning ensures you don't miss out on any domain gems, especially those ripe for acquisition due to their expiration.

âž¤ One-Click Domain Copying

Need to share or save domains quickly? Our extension includes a one-click feature to copy all scanned domains. This is perfect for users who need to quickly evaluate the potential of these domains in other tools or for sharing with team members.

âž¤ Multi-tab Import

Gather domains with ease. Our extension allows you to add multiple domains from different tabs into a single consolidated list. Ideal for extensive domain research, this feature is invaluable for building a comprehensive list of domains, including those that are expired yet hold significant value due to their SEO metrics.

âž¤ Flexible Domain Management

Maintain complete control over your domain list. After scanning, you can effortlessly edit, delete, or manually add new domains to your list. This flexibility is crucial for fine-tuning your collection of domains, especially when focusing on expired domains with promising metrics, ensuring your final list precisely aligns with your acquisition strategy.
